message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for only $10000. It's a one-time opportunity to own something truly special. This product is brand new and comes with a 100% satisfaction guarantee! Are you interested?

Also, I'm a bit concerned about the 66.67% chance of it being low quality.  Perhaps a discount would make me more interested.
